0.description: Scheduled - Trigger for playbooks to run on a specific schedule.

cron.description: Specify a schedule using the UNIX cron format to trigger the playbook (the playbook won't run until the cron triggers for the first time).

interval_in_min.description: If Schedule is not specified, choose an interval in minutes to trigger the playbook periodically, starting immediately. Use -1 as a special value to trigger the playbook only once. It will trigger again every time the playbook is updated.

cron.description: Specify a schedule using the UNIX cron format to trigger the playbook (the playbook won't run until the cron triggers for the first time).

interval_in_min.description: If Schedule is not specified, choose an interval in minutes to trigger the playbook periodically, starting immediately. Use -1 as a special value to trigger the playbook only once. It will trigger again every time the playbook is updated.

2.description: Make a call to a Levelops Query

ignore_errors.description: If Yes, this node will succeed regardless of the API response

path.description: Path appended to the base URL

password.description: Api key for Authentication to reach Levelops Query.

integration_id.description: Pick a satellite integration to make the call from. If not specified, LevelOps will only be able to reach public APIs.

content_type.description: Content type of the body (for example: "application/json")

values.value:
{
    "name": "Trellis Scores",
    "public": true,
    "type": "dashboard",
    "query": {
        "integration_ids": [
"${1.integration_ID}"
        ]
    },
    "metadata": {
        "rbac": {
            "owner": "${1.owner_email}",
            "users": {},
            "allUsers": true,
            "dashboardPermission": "admin"

        },
        "jira_or_query": {
            "metadata": {
                "range_filter_choice": {}
            },
            "issue_types": [
                "BUG",
                "STORY",
                "TASK"
            ],
            "resolutions": [
                "DONE"
            ]
        },
        "global_filters": {},
        "dashboard_time_range": true,
        "effort_investment_unit": false,
        "integration_monitoring": false,
        "effort_investment_profile": false,
        "ou_user_filter_designation": {},
        "dashboard_time_range_filter": "last_quarter",
        "effort_investment_unit_filter": "%_of_engineers"
    },
    "widgets": [
        {
            "deleting": false,
            "deleted": false,
            "updated": false,
            "updating": false,
            "loading": false,
            "loaded": false,
            "creating": false,
            "created": false,
            "error": null,
            "name": "TRELLIS SCORES BY ORG UNITS",
            "type": "dev_productivity_org_unit_score_report",
            "query": {
                "across": "",
                "interval": "LAST_QUARTER"
            },
            "old_order": 1,
            "metadata": {
                "order": 1,
                "width": "full",
                "hidden": false,
                "weights": {
                    "IDLE": 20,
                    "NO_ASSIGNEE": 20,
                    "NO_DUE_DATE": 30,
                    "NO_COMPONENTS": 20,
                    "POOR_DESCRIPTION": 8
                },
                "children": [],
                "description": "",
                "max_records": 20,
                "widget_type": "graph",
                "custom_hygienes": []
            }
        },
        {
            "deleting": false,
            "deleted": false,
            "updated": false,
            "updating": false,
            "loading": false,
            "loaded": false,
            "creating": false,
            "created": false,
            "error": null,
            "name": "TRELLIS SCORE REPORT",
            "type": "dev_productivity_score_report",
            "query": {
                "across": "",
                "interval": "LAST_QUARTER"
            },
            "old_order": 2,
            "metadata": {
                "order": 2,
                "width": "full",
                "hidden": false,
                "weights": {
                    "IDLE": 20,
                    "NO_ASSIGNEE": 20,
                    "NO_DUE_DATE": 30,
                    "NO_COMPONENTS": 20,
                    "POOR_DESCRIPTION": 8
                },
                "children": [],
                "description": "",
                "max_records": 20,
                "widget_type": "graph",
                "custom_hygienes": []
            }
        },
        {
            "deleting": false,
            "deleted": false,
            "updated": false,
            "updating": false,
            "loading": false,
            "loaded": false,
            "creating": false,
            "created": false,
            "error": null,
            "name": "INDIVIDUAL RAW STATS",
            "type": "individual_raw_stats_report",
            "query": {
                "across": "",
                "interval": "LAST_QUARTER",
                "userAttributes": [
                    "team"
                ]
            },
            "old_order": 3,
            "metadata": {
                "order": 3,
                "width": "full",
                "hidden": false,
                "weights": {
                    "IDLE": 20,
                    "NO_ASSIGNEE": 20,
                    "NO_DUE_DATE": 30,
                    "NO_COMPONENTS": 20,
                    "POOR_DESCRIPTION": 8
                },
                "children": [],
                "description": "",
                "max_records": 20,
                "widget_type": "graph",
                "custom_hygienes": [],
                "selected_columns": [
                    "Number of PRs per month",
                    "Number of Commits per month",
                    "Lines of Code per month",
                    "Average Coding days per week",
                    "Average PR Cycle Time",
                    "Number of PRs approved per month",
                    "Percentage of Legacy Rework"
                ]
            }
        }
    ],
    "created_at": 1668107475,
    "demo": false,
    "category": ["${1.OU_category}"]
}
